topic.title: Title With Markup This is in <ph>. Here is a footnote: This is a footnote in a title

body.p: This topic's title has markup that needs to preserved in any <navtitle> markup generated in DITA maps. That is, the result of constructing the effective <topicref> element for the reference to this topic should be: <topicref href="topics/topic-with-markup-in-title.dita"> <topicmeta> <navtitle>Title With Markup <ph>This is in <ph outputclass="codeph"><ph></ph>. Here is a footnote: <fn>This is a footnote in a title</fn></ph></navtitle> </topicmeta> </topicref>
